description.title: Hello, ResoNation.
reasons: • Connect with a community of music lovers.
• Learn about upcoming live events instantly.
description.subtitle: Features

topics.title: Connect
facts: • Connect with other resonators and artists
• Build your music network for the next live concert!

topics.title: Tracking
facts: • Receive suggested events tailored just to your taste.

topics.title: Configurability
facts: • Our app's seamless interface make connecting with others a breeze.
• Customize, configure, and tailor according to your preferences.

topics.title: Payment Control
facts: • You and other resonators can sell tickets!
